title: (x) Phaidon design classics - Glaser Stencil {Kate McDonnell}
content:
Does anyone know what the stenciltype used in phaidon design classics is called?

author: Thord

comments.content: the 6 looks like a customized lubalin graph demi, the three 3 could fit too.
Thank you, elzadra and kesh. Have an nice sunday.
